message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I believe you'd find very useful. I'm asking for $115 for it. Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105.

Bob, I appreciate your interest!  $105 is a bit lower than I'd hoped for, but I'm willing to come down to $110.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product for you. Let me know if you're interested.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $100. I really need to save as much as I can.
